scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Forums_BrowseForums_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="CF_Title" defaultValue="${resource:Forums_BrowseForums_Name}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="showTitleColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowTitle_Forum" defaultValue="true" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="showGroupColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowGroup_Forum" defaultValue="false" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="showPostsColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowPosts" defaultValue="true" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="showLastPostColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowLatest" defaultValue="true" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="group" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Group" defaultValue="Group=-1" dataType="Custom" template="core_v2_groupLookup" enableCurrent="true" /> <property id="groupAndSubGroups" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_GroupAndSubGroups" defaultValue="false" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="itemsBeforeScroll" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ItemsToShow" defaultValue="20" dataType="Int"> <propertyRule name="minmax" min="1" max="100" /> </property> <property id="defaultSortOrder" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_DefaultSortOrder" defaultValue="ApplicationName" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="ApplicationName" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ApplicationName" /> <propertyValue value="Threads" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Threads" /> <propertyValue value="LastPost" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_LastPost" /> <propertyValue value="ApplicationIdsOrder" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Custom" /> </property> <property id="forumSelection" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ForumInclusion" dataType="Custom" template="core_v2_forumOrder" key="forum" includeSubGroupsPropertyId="groupAndSubGroups" visibilityPropertyId="defaultSortOrder" visibilityPropertyValue="ApplicationIdsOrder" groupPropertyId="group" /> <property id="includeGroupName" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_IncludeGroupName" defaultValue="false" dataType="Bool" /> </propertyGroup>
